name: Outsider Strategist～異世界で軍師になる～
description: How fun would it be, if I could succeed as a strategist in a world like that of a tactical RPG? Yuuto, a Japanese young man and the protagonist of this story, dreamt such. Thusly, he was joyed when he really was sent to a different world and hired by a member of local royalty. However, he gradually learns.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7,8,10 Processor: core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows7,8,10 Processor: core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 10 GB available space
